verses.verse: In <S%G1722><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> very great, <S%G3827><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> nothing <S%G3361><s%> <S%G5101><s%> to eat, <S%G5315><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> called <S%G4341><s%> his <S%G848><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> unto him, and <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%>

I have compassion <S%G4697><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> multitude, <S%G3793><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they have now <S%G2235><s%> been <S%G4357><s%> with me <S%G3427><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> nothing <S%G3756><s%> <S%G5101><s%> to eat: <S%G5315><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> I send them away <S%G630><s%> <S%G846><s%> fasting <S%G3523><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> their own <S%G848><s%> houses, <S%G3624><s%> they will faint <S%G1590><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> way: <S%G3598><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> divers <S%G5100><s%> of them <S%G846><s%> came <S%G2240><s%> from far. <S%G3113><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> From whence <S%G4159><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> satisfy <S%G5526><s%> these <S%G5128><s%> men with bread <S%G740><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the wilderness? <S%G2047><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he asked <S%G1905><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> How many <S%G4214><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> ye? And <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G3588><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Seven. <S%G2033><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he commanded <S%G3853><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> people <S%G3793><s%> to sit down <S%G377><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> ground: <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he took <S%G2983><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> loaves, <S%G740><s%> and gave thanks, <S%G2168><s%> and broke, <S%G2806><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> to his <S%G848><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> set before <S%G3908><s%> them; and <S%G2532><s%> they did set them before <S%G3908><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> people. <S%G3793><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they had <S%G2192><s%> a few <S%G3641><s%> small fishes: <S%G2485><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he blessed, <S%G2127><s%> and commanded <S%G2036><s%> to set them also before <S%G3908><s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532><s%> them.

So <S%G1161><s%> they did eat, <S%G5315><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> were filled: <S%G5526><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they took up <S%G142><s%> of the broken <S%G2801><s%> meat that was left <S%G4051><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> baskets. <S%G4711><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> they that had eaten <S%G5315><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> about <S%G5613><s%> four thousand: <S%G5070><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he sent them away. <S%G630><s%> <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> he entered <S%G1684><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a ship <S%G4143><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> his <S%G848><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> parts <S%G3313><s%> of Dalmanutha. <S%G1148><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> came forth, <S%G1831><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> began <S%G756><s%> to question with <S%G4802><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> seeking <S%G2212><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> him <S%G846><s%> a sign <S%G4592><s%> from <S%G575><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> tempting <S%G3985><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he sighed deeply <S%G389><s%> in his <S%G848><s%> spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> saith, <S%G3004><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> doth this <S%G3778><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%> seek after <S%G1934><s%> a sign? <S%G4592><s%> verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> There <S%G1487><s%> shall no sign <S%G4592><s%> be given <S%G1325><s%> unto this <S%G5026><s%> generation. <S%G1074><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he left <S%G863><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and entering <S%G1684><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> ship <S%G4143><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> departed <S%G565><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> other side. <S%G4008><s%>

Now <S%G2532><s%> the disciples had forgotten <S%G1950><s%> to take <S%G2983><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> neither <S%G3756><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> they in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> ship <S%G4143><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them <S%G1438><s%> more than <S%G1508><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> loaf. <S%G740><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he charged <S%G1291><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Take heed, <S%G3708><s%> beware <S%G991><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> leaven <S%G2219><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> leaven <S%G2219><s%> of Herod. <S%G2264><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> they reasoned <S%G1260><s%> among themselves, <S%G4314><s%> <S%G240><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> It is because <S%G3754><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> bread. <S%G740><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> it, he saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> reason <S%G1260><s%> ye, because <S%G3754><s%> ye have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> bread? <S%G740><s%> perceive <S%G3539><s%> ye not yet, <S%G3768><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> understand? <S%G4920><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> ye your <S%G5216><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> hardened? <S%G4456><s%>

Having <S%G2192><s%> eyes, <S%G3788><s%> see <S%G991><s%> ye not? <S%G3756><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> ears, <S%G3775><s%> hear <S%G191><s%> ye not? <S%G3756><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> do ye not <S%G3756><s%> remember? <S%G3421><s%>

When <S%G3753><s%> I broke <S%G2806><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> five thousand, <S%G4000><s%> how many <S%G4214><s%> baskets <S%G2894><s%> full <S%G4134><s%> of fragments <S%G2801><s%> took ye up? <S%G142><s%> They say <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Twelve. <S%G1427><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> four thousand, <S%G5070><s%> how many <S%G4214><s%> baskets <S%G4711><s%> full <S%G4138><s%> of fragments <S%G2801><s%> took ye up? <S%G142><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G3588><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Seven. <S%G2033><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> is it that ye do not <S%G3756><s%> understand? <S%G4920><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he cometh <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Bethsaida: <S%G966><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they bring <S%G5342><s%> a blind man <S%G5185><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> besought <S%G3870><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> touch <S%G680><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he took <S%G1949><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> blind man <S%G5185><s%> by the <S%G3588><s%> hand, <S%G5495><s%> and led <S%G1806><s%> him <S%G846><s%> out <S%G1854><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> town; <S%G2968><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> when he had spit <S%G4429><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> eyes, <S%G3659><s%> and put his hands upon <S%G2007><s%> <S%G5495><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> he asked <S%G1905><s%> him <S%G846><s%> if he saw aught. <S%G1536><s%> <S%G991><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> he looked up, <S%G308><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> I see <S%G991><s%> men <S%G444><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> trees, <S%G1186><s%> walking. <S%G4043><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he sent him away <S%G649><s%> <S%G846><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> house, <S%G3624><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Neither <S%G3366><s%> go <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> town, <S%G2968><s%> nor <S%G3366><s%> tell <S%G2036><s%> it to any <S%G5100><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> town. <S%G2968><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went out, <S%G1831><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> towns <S%G2968><s%> of Caesarea <S%G2542><s%> Philippi: <S%G5376><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> way <S%G3598><s%> he asked <S%G1905><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Whom <S%G5101><s%> do men <S%G444><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> that I <S%G3165><s%> am? <S%G1511><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> whom <S%G5101><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> that I <S%G3165><s%> am? And <S%G1511><s%> <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> answereth <S%G611><s%> and saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> art <S%G1488><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> he charged <S%G2008><s%> them <S%G846><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they should tell <S%G3004><s%> no man <S%G3367><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he began <S%G756><s%> to teach <S%G1321><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> suffer <S%G3958><s%> many things, <S%G4183><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> be rejected <S%G593><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> elders, <S%G4245><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the chief priests, <S%G749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> scribes, <S%G1122><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> be killed, <S%G615><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> rise again. <S%G450><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he spake <S%G2980><s%> that saying <S%G3056><s%> openly. <S%G3954><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> took <S%G4355><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and began <S%G756><s%> to rebuke <S%G2008><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when he <S%G3588><s%> had turned about <S%G1994><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> looked on <S%G1492><s%> his <S%G848><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> he rebuked <S%G2008><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Get <S%G5217><s%> thee behind <S%G3694><s%> me, <S%G3450><s%> Satan: <S%G4567><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> thou savorest <S%G5426><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> that be of God, <S%G2316><s%> but <S%G235><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> that be of men. <S%G444><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when he had called <S%G4341><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> people <S%G3793><s%> unto him with <S%G4862><s%> his <S%G848><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> also, he said <S%G2036><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Whosoever <S%G3748><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> me, <S%G3450><s%> let him deny <S%G533><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> take up <S%G142><s%> his <S%G846><s%> cross, <S%G4716><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> follow <S%G190><s%> me. <S%G3427><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> whosoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> save <S%G4982><s%> his <S%G848><s%> life <S%G5590><s%> shall lose <S%G622><s%> it; <S%G846><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> whosoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> shall lose <S%G622><s%> his <S%G848><s%> life <S%G5590><s%> for my sake <S%G1752><s%> <S%G1700><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> gospel's, <S%G2098><s%> the same <S%G3778><s%> shall save <S%G4982><s%> it. <S%G846><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> shall it profit <S%G5623><s%> a man, <S%G444><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> he shall gain <S%G2770><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> whole <S%G3650><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> lose <S%G2210><s%> his own <S%G848><s%> soul? <S%G5590><s%>
Or <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> shall a man <S%G444><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> in exchange <S%G465><s%> for his <S%G848><s%> soul? <S%G5590><s%>

Whosoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> therefore <S%G1063><s%> shall be ashamed <S%G1870><s%> of me <S%G3165><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of my <S%G1699><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> adulterous <S%G3428><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sinful <S%G268><s%> generation; <S%G1074><s%> of him <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> shall the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> be ashamed, <S%G1870><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> he cometh <S%G2064><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> of his <S%G848><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> angels. <S%G32><s%>
